meanings.definition: The quality of being generous and kind.
meanings.sent1: Her largeheartednesses shone through when she donated to the local charity.
meanings.sent2: The community was touched by the largeheartednesses of the anonymous donor.
meanings.sent3: His largeheartednesses knew no bounds, even offering his last dollar to a stranger.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of selfishness, her largeheartednesses was a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: The largeheartednesses of the volunteers made a lasting impact on the shelter residents.

meanings.definition: Acts of kindness and generosity towards others.
meanings.sent1: The largeheartednesses of the neighbors was evident in their daily acts of helping each other.
meanings.sent2: She dedicated her life to spreading largeheartednesses wherever she went.
meanings.sent3: The largeheartednesses of the children was heartwarming as they shared their toys with those in need.
meanings.sent4: His largeheartednesses was like a warm hug on a cold day, comforting everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The largeheartednesses of the community came together to support the family in need.
